text: Eren Derdiyok (born 12 June 1988) is a former Swiss football player. He played as a striker. He has played for Old Boys, Basel, Bayer Leverkusen, 1899 Hoffenheim, Kasımpaşa, Galatasaray, Göztepe, Pakhtakor Tashkent, Ankaragücü, Schaffhausen, and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Basel Category:UEFA Euro 2008 players Category:2010 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players
title: Eren Derdiyok
